localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A simple application that allows you to generate various copy with just a prompt. Its use ranges from summarizing long text, answering questions, completing thoughts and writing articles. The tool is powered completed by OpenAI's GPT-3 algorithm.
blogPost.body: A simple application that allows you to generate various copy with just a prompt. Its use ranges from summarizing long text, answering questions, completing thoughts and writing articles. The tool is powered completed by OpenAI's GPT-3 algorithm.
blogPost.title: Virtual Ghost Writer - AI copy writer powered by OpenAI
blogPost.author: Stephen Campbell

localize.description: 一个简单的应用程序，只需提示即可生成各种副本。它的使用范围包括总结长篇文本、回答问题、完成思想和撰写文章。该工具由OpenAI的GPT-3算法完成。
一個簡單的應用程序，只需提示即可生成各種副本。它的使用範圍包括總結長篇文本、回答問題、完成思想和撰寫文章。該工具由OpenAI的GPT-3算法完成。

previous.excerpt: Partnerbow makes it simple to request and negotiate price quotes from multiple partners, approve or reject proposed hours and pricing, track payments as well as keep an up-to-date catalogue of all your partner agencies and freelancers.
previous.title: Partnerbow - Easy way to request, negotiate and approve price estimates.

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以让您简单地请求和协商多个合作伙伴的报价，批准或拒绝建议的工时和定价，跟踪付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴机构和自由职业者的最新目录。
localize.tagline: 简单的方法来申请、谈判和批准价格估算。

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以讓您簡單地請求和協商多個合作伙伴的報價，批准或拒絕建議的工時和定價，跟蹤付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴機構和自由職業者的最新目錄。
localize.tagline: 簡單的方法來申請、談判和批准價格估算。

next.excerpt: 👋 FavEmojis.com is a website that allows you to save Emojis as favorites to have them always handy. Find the Emojis you need and just click to copy and paste them wherever you needed. For example to easy create ads, texts, designs.
next.title: 👋 FavEmoji – Copy & Paste Emojis - Save Emojis as favorites. Perfect to create ads/text/design.

localize.description: 👋 FavEmojis.com是一个网站，允许你保存表情符号作为收藏夹，让他们总是方便。找到你需要的Emojis，只需点击复制和粘贴到你需要的地方。例如轻松创建广告、文本、设计。
localize.tagline: 将表情符号保存为收藏夹。完美的创建广告/文本/设计。

localize.description: 👋 FavEmojis.com是一個網站，允許你保存表情符號作爲收藏夾，讓他們總是方便。找到你需要的Emojis，只需點擊複製和粘貼到你需要的地方。例如輕鬆創建廣告、文本、設計。
localize.tagline: 將表情符號保存爲收藏夾。完美的創建廣告/文本/設計。
